entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SearchBox Background #10357
  • [iOS] TabBar Icons not showing when using FontIconSource for Tab.Icon #10350
  • [iOS] Status Bar Background rectangle visible in Landscape mode #10349
  • NullReferenceException from Shell GetBackButtonBehavior #10348
  • Look at making accessibility properties a NOOP for some invalid cases on iOS #10347
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • iOS Simulators list not populated #10346
  • Global MAUI Reference #10345
  • Maui failed to reference ios binding library #10344
  • AL1012: 'arm64' is not a valid setting for option 'platform' thrown when localized resources are available and debugging on remote iOS device #10342
  • Page.Unloaded does not fire when app is closed #10341
    Backlog
  • [Bug] "Live Visual Tree" doesn't work for a MAUI app on Windows, but works for a WinUI3 app #10339
  • MSBuild says Android API 31 missing when trying to build MAUI app, but it isn't missing. #10337

Closed

  • VoiceOver doesn't navigate to items contained in a CollectionView which has a SemanticProperties.Description set #7114
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Change the control type announced by the VoiceOver screen reader when it encounters a Maui Picker control #7001
    7.0
  • MauiApp is a Poor Name for a Class - Should be Renamed #10343
  • Black screen on iOS #10314
  • Picker ‘SelectedIndex’ is not effective #10305
  • iOS and Android in releasemode does not change background color on button when changing states. #10335
  • Issue Building the simplest of Repos #10340
  • There is no link for mac installations #10179
  • Grid no longer adds implicit rows/columns #10338
  • DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfoChanged The active Window can not be detected. Ensure that you have called Init in your Application class. #7809
    Backlog
  • Windows Capabilities in appxmanifest not properly used by building .msix #10287
  • Unable to build a project with net7 RC 1 #10234
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Enhancement] Introduce a new FlyoutDisplayOptions on Shell "DisplayAsChildren" #6973

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix FilePicker on Windows Unpackaged #10356
    7.0-rc2
  • Use a better fix for the ios16 things #10355
  • Disconnect lifecycle callback when nav removed #10353
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • [Android] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer for Android #10352

Merged

  • Bring upstream version changes to `release/6.0.5xx-sr6` branch #10354
  • Standardize all the ctors for the core handlers #10332
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10336
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Bumps for 7.0.0-rc2 #10290
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix Essentials Email #10063
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix Semantic Property Propagation and CV TabStop #10156
    area/a11y, 7.0
  • Sizing and inset math corrections for Button contentlayout #10309
    area/controls 🎮
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0
  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Windows] Pending changes to correctly updating WinUI properties via resources #8193
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Including pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms SRs #8702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix wrong Slider ThumbImage size #8760
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [Windows] Fix shadows on shapes #8808
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix AdaptiveTriggers #9984
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, .NET 7 Planning
  • Fix remaining (API) docs warnings #10090
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, t/docs 📝
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Load local images without extensions on Windows #9631
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:
  • [Android] Update RadioButton to get inline content view text #9633
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (not before) #9678
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecesary parent) #9840
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, high
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Housekeeping] Complete pending TODOs in Core #10015
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix crash with second window and WebView #10013
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, high, control-webview
  • [Windows] Map the Window title to the automation name property #10159
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
  • Align Shapes Fill property behavior with Xamarin.Forms #10328
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
